body_html:
I agree with same code/git base.

Having notebooks unittested would be great. That probably would solve python version differences on ie https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/* too.

@wolffg where is that discussion documented?

download a jupyter notebook from any tutorial page (i.e. a dynamically concerted notebook form of any doc page).

Is a link to raw version not enough?

body:
I agree with same code/git base.

Having notebooks unittested would be great. That probably would solve python version differences on ie https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/* too.

@wolffg where is that discussion documented?

> download a jupyter notebook from any tutorial page (i.e. a dynamically concerted notebook form of any doc page).

Is a link to raw version not enough?
